summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json to track the requirement but does not implement any actual data restoration. No backend code changes, database migrations, or data recovery mechanisms are present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Restore all user-added content (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom quotes, resources, and cybercrime articles) that was present before the draft app expired
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds a feature request entry to project_state.json but contains no implementation of actual data restoration logic, database operations, or backend changes to recover the lost content
